name: Glass Land
description:
My submission to Godot Wild Jam 44. The goal is to travel as much as possible using arrow keys (up,left,right). Don't click on the exit button, it won't work in the web version. I kept it for aesthetic reasons.

Tools Used

  • Godot
  • Inkscape
  • Krita
  • Audacity

Assets Used

  • Main Character - https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1
  • Broken glass font - https://www.dafont.com/broken-glass.font
  • HUD font - https://www.dafont.com/monofonto.font
  • Sound effects -
    • https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx
    • http://www.gameburp.com/free-game-sound-fx/
    • glass breaking sound - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6lup09niGyM

Sample Gameplay
